summary: Racemenu presets for a male Nord.
descriptionHtml:
OK, I completely forgot I actually uploaded this preset here and never actually published it. Like... Nine months ago. My screenshooting skills have improved a bit, but whatever. Preset is the same, I guess.

Connor is a preset tweaked from my old [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69777/?]Gwilym preset[/url].
Some similarities, but lots of differences. Think of him as a younger brother or cousin, perhaps! 
I have used him for months and made several variants and taken lots of pics with various ENBs, so I include two presets to represent the pics I've taken. 
The hair/beards/eyes on pics might be somewhat different than the presets, but I'm sure you can manage to find the one you prefer. Note that expressions and ENBs also change the appearence. 

You will need:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]
[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?]Fine Face Textures for Men by Urshi[/url] (Seriously. He will look like a potato without it!)
Or I guess you could just use his face as a base and make him to your own liking... Yeah, you could try that! Go for it! 

Recommended:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?]Beards[/url]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?]True Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665/?]Better Makeup for SKSE[/url] (male version)  You CAN skip if you plan on removing it or you somehow enjoy ultra pixlated vanilla textures.
SAM body (Google for it)

If you don't want to use the Fine Face textures for ALL your Skyrim males, you can use this preset for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]Ningheim Race[/url].
I have used all my male Nord presets for male Ningheims and have never noticed any major problems.
author: Kamihana
